messages.content: It's real enough sadly. Kin have been around for awhile in their own corners of the net.
I'm a little sad that there's not actually a video called Dance of the Hillary, virus or not.
No, what’s sad is saying the same message like it’s news. He’s a copy paste machine. No original thought.
I always feel so bad for [NAME] when I watch this scene.
Gonna be sad when Gameday is inside a gym for shooty hoops. I already miss CFB :(
Girlfriend weak as well, that jump was pathetic.
I never understood the part where he dives into a pile of money, even as a child. It seems wildly painful.
I feel extremely bad for people in this thread who are in any way shape or form relying on the federal government to improve their situation.
I know, right?! I was literally in tears Saturday night 😪 It's only 3 years old!!
It’s a cruel thing to say to someone with depression.
This happens to me all the time I’m so sorry 😣 it’s always with burgers, too. So painful.
What a horrible way to find out, though. My sympathies to the dead man.
Please post any news you may find about her fate. This is so sad and so wrong. We need to know what happens to her.
My coworker got cheated on by her boyfriend of 8 years and needs a night out so I can't even get out of it sigh.
It still hurts 15 years later. I don't know how people can be so callous their own child
That's sad. I'm 16 and where I am there are loads of athiests my age. It's great.
Holy bait-and-switch, [NAME]. I’m so sorry, that has to be incredibly stressful to have to be around and deal with.
She had really bad chronic back pain from what I can remember, so was self treating with alcohol
I can relate. It kind of breaks your heart and your spirit, doesn’t it?
Not sad enough fo here the skeleton is dead so he can't comit sucide
